# FAP文件验证协议
文件验证协议
# File Authentication Protocol
文件验证协议

# 在线网页

[文件分享](https://file.wyfxw.cn/ "文件在线分享验证协议")

# 协议软件

[下载客户端](https://github.com/wyfxw-cn/fapclient "fapclient")

+ 运行客户端支持浏览器直接打开fap协议,fap://

# 协议分享

[分享文件](http://file.wyfxw.cn/? "分享文件")

# 协议形式

fap:

# 协议内容格式

```
{
    "ver": "1.0",
    "id": null,
    "des": null,
    "flag": null,
    "user": null,
    "pwd": null,
    "expires": 1711778295,
    "list": [
        {
            "name": "离散数学(第3版) 邓辉文.pdf",
            "author": "邓辉文",
            "size": 52072668,
            "sha1": "c564cca501fa9f127a6611ef51e944153649abdb",
            "md5": "8cea8604fi67efeea36cd0633ef6a943",
            "s1": "6030d3851cf253d04d84428bb75ced1244054aa8",
            "s2": null,
            "s3": null,
            "s4": null,
            "crc32": "685ddea4",
            "crc64": "15689454736268311251",
            "url": null,
            "tmp": null,
            "ext": "pdf",
            "mime": "attachment",
            "type": "file",
            "fid": null,
            "did": null,
            "category": "doc",
            "created": 1611778295,
            "updated": 1611778295,
            "state": null
        }
    ]
}
```

# 转换代码

```
        function bin2hex(str) {
            var ret = '';
            var r = /[0-9a-zA-Z_.~!*()]/;
            for (var i = 0, l = str.length; i < l; i++) {
                if (r.test(str.charAt(i))) {
                    ret += str.charCodeAt(i).toString(16);
                } else {
                    ret += encodeURIComponent(str.charAt(i)).replace(/%/g, '');
                }
            }
            return ret.toLowerCase();
        }
        function hex2bin(str) {
            var ret = '';
            var tmp = '';
            for (var i = 0; i < str.length - 1; i += 2) {
                var c = String.fromCharCode(parseInt(str.substr(i, 2), 16));
                if (c.charCodeAt() > 127) {
                    tmp += '%' + str.substr(i, 2);
                    if (tmp.length == 9) {
                        ret += decodeURIComponent(tmp);
                        tmp = '';
                    }
                } else {
                    ret += c;
                }
            }
            return ret;
        }
        function fapHex(files) {
            return 'fap://' + bin2hex(JSON.stringify(files))
        }
        function hexFap(fap) {
            if (fap.substr(0, 6) != 'fap://') throw 'neq fap://'
            fap = fap.substr(6)
            return hex2bin(fap)
        }
```
